title: Buffy: The Tales (23 Stories) (Dark Horse) (2001-2010) (Digital)
description:
Overview:


  <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tales_of_the_Slayers" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tales_of_the_Slayers</a>

  <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tales_of_the_Vampires" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tales_of_the_Vampires</a>




Contains:


   Tales of the Slayers                             (2001) (Dgtl-GN-1024) (MM)

   Tales of the Slayers  - Broken Bottle of Djinn   (2002) (Dgtl-1280)    (Empire)

   Tales of the Vampires                            (2004) (Dgtl-GN-1024) (MM)

   Tales of the Vampires - Thrill                   (2009) (Dgtl-1280)    (Empire)

   Tales of the Vampires - Carpe Noctem (from MDHP) (2010) (webrip-750)   (DCP)


   The two GNs contain 20 shorts between them, so that makes 23 total, as it says in
   the title. Which is the lot, and corresponds to the contents of the (unscanned)
   "Tales" omnibus edition, according to comicbookdb. I think I have a vague memory
   of having seen "Carpe Noctem" elsewhere and in better quality (one of the "Season
   Eight" trades seems the best bet)... but I may just be confusing things again! :P
